cast.overview: In the late 1960s, the Beach Boys' Brian Wilson stops touring, produces "Pet Sounds" and begins to lose his grip on reality. By the 1980s, under the sway of a controlling therapist, he finds a savior in Melinda Ledbetter.
cast.title: Love & Mercy

details.biography: Carolyn Stotesbery is a multi-hyphenate talent: actor, writer, producer and singer. Carolyn was most recently seen guest starring on ABC's hit show Castle. Before then, Carolyn appeared in Roadside Attraction's film "Love & Mercy" opposite John Cusack and Elizabeth Banks and was the love interest to title character "Agent X" (Jeff Hephner) on the ...
details.name: Carolyn Stotesbery
